casebody.data:
Dominic A. LOWE, Appellant-Plaintiff,
v.
Brian SMITH, the Warden of the Putnamville Correctional Facility, et al., Appellees-Defendants. Court of Appeals Case No. 67A01-1709-MI-2129 Court of Appeals of Indiana. FILED June 29, 2018

DISPOSITION OF CASE BY UNPUBLISHED MEMORANDUM DECISION

ROBB , J.

Reversed and remanded.

NAJAM, J., Concurs.

ALTICE, J., Concurs.
